name: Accusations
effect: Choose a character that entered play from a discard pile or deck this turn. Shuffle that character into its owner's deck.

name: Against All Odds
effect: Your character in battle gains +5 to all stats. Use only while you have less power than your opponent. Limit one Against All Odds per battle.

name: Apartment
effect:
Non-Unique

Quincies and Bounts in your party gain +1 to all stats and cannot be depleted by your opponent's effects.

name: Aramaki - Always Forgotten
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Your Squad 11 characters cost -1 body energy.

name: Attack of the Killer Bunnies
effect: Attach to one of your characters in play and choose one of your opponent's characters. Deplete both characters. You may choose not to renew attached character during your Resource Step. Your opponent's character cannot renew while attached character is depleted.

name: Baura
effect:
Doll

(Sawatari) You may also collect battlegrounds, characters, and events from your discard pile as Souls at the start of your turn. (*) Your items count as 2 Souls. (*) When a character in your opponent's party is removed from play from one of your card effects, draw 2 cards. Limit once per turn.

name: Bitto - Swarm
effect:
Evil, Non-Unique, Spirit

(Bount guardians can have up to 60 Bitto characters in their deck.)

name: Blade of the Ryodoji
effect: Attached character gets +1 to all stats. (*) While attached to Blank or Ganryu you gain power equal to the amount of power damage attached character does.

name: Blank - Wandering Aimlessly
effect:
Non-Unique, Spirit

(Ganryu and Senna guardians can have up to 60 Blank characters in their deck. If your guardian is Ganryu, the base energy cost for Blank is 1 body energy. If your guardian is Senna, the base energy cost for Blank is 1 spirit energy.)

name: Bonnie - Leading the Way
effect:
Animal

Discard Bonnie from play: Search your deck for a Ganju and a Kukaku and put them in your hand.

name: Booby Trapped!
effect: When one of your opponent's effects on the queue would affect one (and only one) character in your party, you may have it affect one character in your opponent's party instead.

name: Book of Doll Summoning
effect: Discard Book of Doll Summoning from play: Put up to 2 Dolls from your deck and/or discard pile into your hand.

name: Bount Cave
effect: Discard Bount Cave from play and discard a Bount from your hand: The next Bount you play this turn costs -X energy. X = the energy cost of the character you discarded.

name: Bount Sensor of Justice
effect: 1 Body, say "Bount Sensor of Justice!": Attached character gains +2 STR or +2 FOR this turn. Limit twice per turn.

name: Bount Signet
effect: 1 Spirit: You may play characters from your Souls this turn.

name: Byakuya - Surprised
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Deplete, discard Byakuya from play: Search your deck for a Squad 6 character and put it in play. That character gains "Aggressive."

name: Cain - Carefree
effect:
Bount, Human, Male

Remove Cain from play: Search your deck for a Bount and put it in your hand.

name: Calm Down
effect: Lower an opponent's attacking character back to its base stats this battle. That character does not renew during its controller's next Resource Step.

name: Captured
effect: (If your guardian is Mabashi or Go Koga, Captured costs 2 mind energy.) Gain control of an opponent's character with an energy cost of 4 or less until the end of the turn.

name: Careful Observation
effect: Remove a character in your party from the game: Gain 5 power. If you removed a Squad 12 character, put it in play at the start of the next End Step.

name: Chad - Fighting for a Friend
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male

(Chad counts as having "Karakura" in his title.) Defensive 3. Chad can use his STR to defend as any stat if you have 1 or more other characters in your party with "Karakura" in the title.

name: Chad - Quiet
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male

When Chad enters play, put the top X cards of your discard pile at the bottom of your deck in any order. X = The number of non-Student Humans in your party.

name: Combining Forces
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Discard a Squad 10 character from your hand: Renew a Squad 10 character in your party or search your deck for a battleground and put it in play.

name: Communication Device
effect:
Non-Unique

Attached character gains "Deplete: Name a Squad. Characters from that Squad cannot use activated effects this turn."

name: Concentrated Soul Essence
effect:
Non-Unique

(While Concentrated Soul Essence is a Soul, it counts as 2 Souls instead of 1.) Attached Bount gains +2 to all stats.

name: Control Yourself
effect: Renew X energy. X = the energy cost of your character leaving play because of an overlay.

name: Dalk
effect:
Doll

(Go Koga) You may also collect battlegrounds, characters, and items from your discard pile as Souls at the start of your turn. (*) 1 Soul: Rearrange the top 3 cards of your discard pile. Limit once per turn. (*) When cards would be discarded from your hand, deck, or party, you may put them at the bottom of your discard pile instead of the top.

name: Dark Ritual
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Lose half your power, rounded down. Cancel any card or effect on the queue. If that card was a character, item, or battleground, it does not come into play and is discarded.

name: Distress Call
effect: For each character in your party, you may search your deck for a character from that Squad and put it in your hand. You may only search for one character per Squad.

name: Dragged To Safety
effect: Your opponent loses X power. X = the number of Students in your party. (*) If your guardian is Orihime Inoue, you may return any Students in your party to your hand.

name: Dramatic Entrance
effect: Reveal your hand to your opponent. Your opponent chooses a character in your hand. He loses 3 power or you may put that character in play.

name: Dramatic Finish
effect: When one of your characters leaves play this turn, your opponent loses 1 power. (*) If your guardian is Maki Ichinose, put in play a Squad 11 character with an energy cost of 4 or less from your discard pile.

name: Empty Clearing
effect: When Empty Clearing enters play, name an event. That event costs +1 mind energy to play while Empty Clearing is in play. If your guardian is Yasutora "Chad" Sado that event cannot be played while Empty Clearing is in play.

name: Fiery Ruins
effect: Discard a card from your hand: Your opponent discards a card from his hand. If you discarded a Whole, your opponent discards a card at random instead. Limit once per turn.

name: Final Request
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Put in play a character with an energy cost of 5 or less from your discard pile. Use only if your opponent has 2 or more characters in his party than you do.

name: Flying Kick
effect: Your character in battle gets +2 to all stats this battle. That character gets an additional +1 to all stats for each non-Kon Animal in your party.

name: Frozen
effect: (If your guardian is Rukia Kuchiki, Frozen costs 1 mind energy.) Choose a depleted character in your opponent's party. Your opponent pays 2 energy or removes that character from the game. Use only during your opponent's Resource Step.

name: Fun Times
effect: You may deplete a character in your party and a character in your opponent's party. For each character depleted this way, gain 1 power.

name: Ganju - Master of the Sandpaw
effect:
Good, Male, Spirit

Renew Ganju: Attach an item to Ganju from your discard pile for no energy cost. Use only when one of your other Spirits enters play. Limit once per turn.

name: Ganryu
effect:
Guardian's Power: 38

Your Blank characters gain “Deplete: Put in play a Blank from your discard pile.” (*) Evil Soul Reapers in your party gain +X to all stats. X = the number of Blank characters in your party.

name: Ganryu - Leader of the Ryodoji Clan
effect:
Cute, Evil, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Your Evil Soul Reapers cost 2 body energy to play. (*) When one of your Blank enters play, your opponent loses 1 power.

name: Ganryu - On the Attack
effect:
Cute, Evil, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Aggressive. When Ganryu attacks, you may search your deck for a Blank and put it in your hand.

name: Go - Intimidating
effect:
Bount, Evil, Human, Male

When Go enters play, if the top card of your discard pile is a Bount, you may put it in play.

name: Go - Old Ways
effect:
Bount, Human, Male

When Go enters play, you may discard a Bount from your hand. If you do, Go gains "Aggressive."

name: Go Koga
effect:
Guardian's Power: 40

At the start of your turn, you may collect any events in your discard pile or hand as Souls. (*) While the top card of your discard pile is a Bount, Bounts in your party get +3 to all stats.

name: Hado 33 - Sokatsui
effect: Discard a character in play with an energy cost of 3 or less that does not have the SPP stat. If you have a Soul Reaper in your party with an energy cost of 7 or more, discard any character that does not have SPP instead.

name: Hanataro - Always Helping
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When one of your card effects gains you power, you may have your opponent lose that much power instead. Use only if your guardian is Retsu Unohana.

name: Hanataro - Booby Trapped
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When Hanataro leaves play, deplete X characters in your opponent's party. X = the number of non-Student Humans in your party, to a max of 3.

name: Hanataro - Healer
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Deplete: Put in play a Squad 4 Non-Unique Soul Reaper from your discard pile. That character gains "Aggressive" this turn.

name: Hanataro - Working
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When one of your non-Student Humans enters play, gain 2 power.

name: He's On Fire!
effect: Discard an Animal in your party: Your opponent loses power equal to the energy cost of the Animal discarded.

name: Held Against Your Will
effect: Name a trait. Characters with that trait get -2 to all stats while attacking this turn.

name: Horned Hollow - Grinning
effect:
Evil, Hollow, Non-Unique

Your Hollows that have an energy cost of 5 or more cost -1 energy to play.

name: Hot Tub
effect:
Non-Unique

Remove a card from your hand: Shuffle X cards from your discard pile into your deck or your opponent shuffles X cards from his discard pile into his deck. X = the energy cost of the removed card. Limit once per turn. Use only on your turn.

name: Ichigo - Bankai Empowered
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

When Ichigo or another character in your party enters play, you may deplete that character to put an event from your removed from game pile into your discard pile. Use only if your guardian is Ichigo Kurosaki or Zangetsu.

name: Ichigo - Fighting Through
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

When Ichigo enters play, draw a card for each other Ichigo of any version in your party, to a max of 5.

name: Ichigo - Lead Away
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

(Discard Ichigo from your hand: Shuffle any number of Ichigo characters of any version from your discard pile into your deck.)

name: Ichigo - Loved
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male

When Ichigo enters play, your opponent reveals X cards in his hand. X = the number of other non-Student humans in your party. Gain 1 power for each event revealed.

name: Ichigo - Smirking
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

When Ichigo enters play, you may search your discard pile for a Zangetsu and attach it to him for no energy cost. If your guardian is Zangetsu you may search your discard pile or deck instead.

name: Ichigo - Wounded
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

Aggressive. Renew Ichigo after any attack where he does 4 or more power damage. Use only while you have at least 1 other Ichigo of any version in your party. Limit once per turn.

name: Ichigo and Izuru - Double Teaming
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(Ichigo and Izuru belong to Squad 3 (*) If your guardian has an effect when Ichigo and Izuru enter play, you may use that effect twice.) Remove Ichigo and Izuru from play: Put in play an Ichigo or Izuru of any version from your discard pile.

effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Defensive 2. (*) When Ikkaku enters play, search your deck for a Hozukimaru and attach it to him for no energy cost. Use only while you have at least 1 other Squad 11 character in your party.

name: Illusion Power
effect: (Illusion Power costs -1 energy for each non-Kon Animal in your party. Remove from game after use.) Gain control of a character in your opponent's party until the end of the turn. That character gains "Aggressive" this turn.

effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Remove your opponent's attacker from battle. Deplete that character.

name: Immobilized By Fear
effect: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each event that was discarded, your opponent discards the top 2 cards of his deck.

name: Isshin - Crushed
effect:
Good, Human, Male

Discard an Ichigo, Karin, Masaki, or Yuzu from your hand: Isshin gets +2 to all stats this turn.

name: Izuru - Expressionless
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When you would have to discard any cards from your hand for an activated effect of one of your Squad 3 characters, you may discard 1 card from the top of your deck instead.

name: Jai - Looming
effect:
Evil, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

name: Jin - Bitto Leader

Bount, Cute, Evil, Human, Male

Non-unique Spirits in your party gain the "Bount" trait.

name: Jin - Defensive
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Human, Male

(Jin costs -1 energy for each Bount in your party.) Defensive X. X = the number of Souls you have. (*) When Jin wins a battle, your opponent loses 9 power. Use only while your guardian can collect Souls. (*) When your opponent attacks, choose a stat. Jin may defend with that stat this battle.

name: Jin - Merged
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Human, Male

Jin gets +1 to all stats for each Bount that has attacked this turn.

name: Jin - Shadowed
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Human, Male

Deplete: Choose a Bount in your Souls. That character counts as 4 Souls this turn.

name: Jin Kariya
effect:
Guardian's Power: 38

At the start of your turn, you may collect any cards in your discard pile or hand as Souls. (*) Bounts in your party cannot leave play from your opponent's effects while you have 10 or more Souls.

name: Juiced
effect: Choose a stat. You may use any cards that boost that stat to boost your attacking or defending stat this battle.

name: Jushiro - Serious
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When Jushiro enters play, reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put 2 of those cards into your hand and discard the remaining cards. Use only if you have at least 1 other Squad 13 character in your party.

Cute, Good, Human, Male

Cute, Good, Human, Male

name: Kenpachi - Captain By Force
effect:
Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(If your guardian is Kenpachi Zaraki, Kenpachi costs -2 Body and -2 Spirit to play and gains "Aggressive".) When Kenpachi enters play from your hand you may discard a character in play with "Captain" in the title.

name: Kenpachi - Chatting
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Aggresive. While Kenpachi is renewed, your opponent's characters get -1 to all stats. Use only while you have 1 or more other Squad 11 characters in your party.

name: Kenpachi - Enjoying Himself
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(Discard Kenpachi from your hand: You take a maximum of 2 power damage from characters with an energy cost of 3 or 4 this turn. Use only while your guardian is Kenpachi Zaraki and you have at least 2 Squad 11 characters in your party.)

name: Kisuke - Revealing Information
effect:
Good, Human, Male

Your opponent plays with his hand face up. Use only while you have at least 2 other non-Student Humans in your party.

effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

Kon cannot attack unless you have 2 or more other Animals in your party.

name: Kon - Hung Out to Dry
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

Discard Kon from play: Choose an energy cost. Kon characters of any version in your party with that cost are not discarded by your opponent's effects this turn. Use only when any of your Kon characters of any version would be discarded by an opponent's effect.

name: Kon - Sweating It Out
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

When Kon enters and leaves play, you may search your deck for an event with Kon in the picture and put it in your hand.

name: Konpakumajin - Imposing
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

(You may deplete three non-Kon Animals in your party instead of paying Konpakumajin's energy cost). When a non-Kon Animal in your party would leave play because of an opponent's effect, you may choose a different Animal in your party instead.

name: Lirin - Chatty
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

Discard a character from your hand: Search your deck for a different version of the character you discarded and put it in your hand. If you discarded an Animal, you may search for any character instead. Limit once per turn.

name: Lirin - Disguised
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

1 Mind: Choose a character in your party. That character gains the Human or the Animal trait.

name: Lirin and Kurodo - In Disguise

Animal, Cute, Good

When Lirin and Kurodo enter play, your opponent loses 3 power for each character that was overlaid by this character.

name: Locked Up
effect: Your opponent cannot draw cards from his card effects in this queue. When he would have drawn a card(s), you may draw a card.

name: Mabashi

Guardian's Power: 37

name: Mabashi - Crazed
effect:
Bount, Evil, Human, Male

name: Maki - Former Lieutenant of Squad 11
effect:
Cute, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Maki gains the Evil trait if any characters in your party are Evil. (*) Maki gains the Good trait if any characters in your party are Good. (*) Deplete: Your Squad 11 character in battle gaints +5 to all stats this battle.

name: Maki - Hooded
effect:
Cute, Evil, Male, Soul Reaper

(If your guardian can collect Souls, Maki has the Bount trait.) Maki gets +1 to all stats for each other Bount in your party, to a max of +3.

name: Maki Ichinose

effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When Mayuri enters play, search your deck for a Squad 12 character and put it in your hand. Your opponent gains 10 power.

effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Soldier, Soul Reaper

effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Put the bottom event from your discard pile into your hand.

effect: Attached character gets +1 to all stats. (*) While attached to Maki, characters in your opponent's party get -1 to all stats.

Good, Human, Male

effect:
Good, Human, Male

effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

You may overlay any Animals in your party with a Human version of that character and vice versa for no energy cost.

name: Noba - Surprised

Good, Human, Male

effect:
Good, Human, Male

(You may play Noba any time you could play an Event). If this Noba enters play because of an overlay, shuffle up to two characters with an energy cost of 4 or less in play into their owner's deck.

name: Orihime - Doubtful
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

When Orihime enters play, draw a card for each character with "Shunshunrikka" in the title in your party.

Cute, Female, Good, Human

Cute, Female, Good, Human

effect: Return two Non-Unique characters in your opponent's party to their owner's hands.

Non-Unique

effect: Deplete a character in your opponent's party. Draw cards equal to that character's boost value.

effect: Choose an Animal or Human in your party. If you chose an Animal, search you deck for a Human version of that character and put it in your hand. If you chose a Human, search you deck for an Animal version of that character and put it in your hand.

effect:

name: Sawatari - Chuckling

Choose one: Remove an item or battleground in play from the game, shuffle a character with an energy cost of 4 or less in play into its owner's deck, or choose a player to shuffle 8 cards from their discard pile into their deck. (*) Lose 5 power.

name: Senna
effect:

Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

effect: Gain control of an opponent's character with an energy cost of X or less until the end of the turn. X = the number of Souls you have. Use only while you have less power than your opponent.

name: Slap Some Sense Into You
effect: Your opponent loses X power. X = the number of depleted characters in his party. Use only when one of your Non-Student Humans enters play.

name: Sodenoshirayuki
effect: Attached character gets +1 to all stats (*) While attached to Rukia, at the start of your Main Step you may deplete a character with an energy cost equal to or less than attached character.

name: Soi Fon - Reporting In
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(Discard Soi Fon from your hand: Shuffle up to 3 characters in your oponent's party with an energy cost of 2 or less into their owner's deck. Use only while you have at least 1 Squad 2 character in your party.)

name: Squad 11 Headquarters
effect: Discard a Squad 11 character from your hand: You do not take power damage from an attack if that character's boost stat is the same stat as the attacking character's. If your guardian is Kenpachi Zaraki, the stats do not have to match. Limit once per turn.

name: Stalemate
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Discard your character in battle: Discard your opponent’s character in battle. For each character discarded this way, that character’s controller may put in play depleted a character from their hand if they have a matching attacking/defending stat. Those characters are now in battle.

name: Store Manager - Watching Out
effect:
Human, Male

Discard Store Manager from play: Search your deck for a battleground and put it in play.

name: Strategic Meeting
effect: Draw a card. (*) If your guardian is Toshiro Hitsugaya, Squad 10 characters in your party cannot leave play from your opponent's effects this turn.

name: Surprise Appearance
effect: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may overlay 1 character revealed for no energy cost. Put the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Surveillance Device - Attacking
effect:
Evil, Non-Unique, Spirit

(You may play Suveillance Device from your side deck as if it was in your hand.) When Surveillance Device enters play, look at your opponent's hand.

name: Tessai - Chatting
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When an item in your party leaves play, search your deck for an item with a lower energy cost and attach it to Tessai for no energy cost. Limit once per turn.

name: Tessai - Yelling
effect:
Good, Human, Male

If Tessai enters play because he was overlaid, all items attached to the overlayed character are attached to Tessai. (*) Discard an item attached to Tessai: Draw a card.

name: The Morning After
effect: When one of your Bounts leaves play this turn, your opponent loses power equal to that character's energy cost.

name: Toshiro - Icy
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Discard a Squad 10 character from your hand: Deplete all characters in your opponent's party with an energy cost less than the character you discarded. Renew Toshiro. Limit once per turn.

name: Toshiro - Surprised
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Remove Toshiro from the game at the end of any turn he attacked. (*) When Toshiro leaves play search your deck for a Toshiro of any version with an energy cost of 4 or less and put it in play. Use only while your guardian is Toshiro Hitsugaya.

name: Tug of War
effect: Shuffle a character in your party into your deck: Shuffle an item your opponent controls into its owner's deck.

name: Ugaki - Drinking Up
effect:
Bount, Evil, Human, Male

Your items that are Souls count as 2 Souls instead of 1. (*) Ugaki gains "Aggressive" while you have at least 10 Souls.

name: Ugaki - Quietly Confident
effect:
Bount, Evil, Human, Male

Each turn, Ugaki gets +1 to all stats that turn for every Soul you collected from your hand at the start of that turn, to a max of +3.

name: Underfoot
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Deplete a Kon character of any version in your party: Gain X power. X = the number of Kon characters of any version in your party.

name: Ururu - Dropping In
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Your FOR boosts may boost STR instead and vice versa.

name: Uryu - Bringing a Friend
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy

Remove a card in your hand from the game: Search your deck for a character whose boost stat matches the boost stat of the card removed from game and put it in your hand. Limit once per turn.

name: Uryu - Seeking Answers
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy

(Discard Uryu from your hand: Search your deck for a Quincy with an energy cost of 4 or less and put it in your hand.)

name: Uryu - Smirking
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy

When you boost Uryu with a Quincy, you may boost any stat.

name: Uryu - Youngster
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy

Remove Uryu from play: Chose a Quincy in your party, that Quincy is not discarded from an opponent’s card effect. Use only when a Quincy in your party would be discarded.

name: Water Kettle
effect:
Non-Unique

Remove Water Kettle from the game: Search your opponent's deck for 2 cards with different titles and remove them from the game.

name: Waterfall
effect: Squad 12 characters in your party gain "Aggressive" and -1 to all stats.

name: Yachiru - Worried
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(Discard Yachiru from your hand: Squad 11 characters with an energy cost of 2 or less are not discarded from your opponent's effects this turn.)

name: Yoruichi - Concerned
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Each Animal in your party gains +1 to all stats for each Human version of that character in the discard pile and vice versa.

name: Yoruichi - Solemn
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

When Yoruichi enters play, search your deck for an Animal Yoruichi and put it in your hand. (*) When an Animal in your party is overlayed by a Human, return the overlaid character to your hand instead and vice versa. Limit once per turn.

name: Yoshi - Armed and Dangerous
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human

When Yoshi attacks, choose a character with an energy cost of X or less. That character must defend if able. X = the number of Souls you have.

name: Yoshi - Smirking
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human

(Discard Yoshi from your hand: Search your deck for an event with "Bount" or "Doll" in the text and put it on top of your deck.)

name: Yoshi - Smug
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human

When Yoshi enters play, rearrange the top 2 cards of your discard pile.

name: Yoshino - Contemplating
effect:
Bount, Cute, Female, Human

When Yoshino enters play, choose a character in your opponent's party to leave play. That character returns to play at the end of the turn. Use only while you have a Bount guardian.

name: Yoshino - Happy Memories
effect:
Bount, Cute, Female, Human

When you attack with Yoshino you may put an item from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Yoshino - Serving
effect:
Bount, Cute, Female, Human

1 Soul: Search your deck for 3 Bounts with different names and collect them as Souls. Limit once per turn. (*) Yoshino gets +1 to all stats while you have at least 5 Souls.

name: Yuck!
effect: Discard up to 3 items in play.

name: Yumichika - Dazzling
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Renew Yumichika: Search your deck for a Squad 11 character and put it on top of your deck. Limit once per turn. Use only on your turn.

name: Yumichika - On the Team
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When Yumichika enters play, name a trait. While you have only Squad 11 characters in your party, your opponent must pay 1 energy the first time he declares an attack with a character that has that trait each turn.

name: Yumichika - Searching
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Deplete: Choose a character in your opponent's party. That character gains -X to all stats this turn. X = the number of Squad 11 characters in your party.

name: Yuzu - Always Cheerful
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

When Yuzu enters play, you may discard an opponent's attached card in play. Use only while you have 1 or more other Non-Student Humans in your party.

name: Zennosuke - Acting Cool
effect:
Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When Zennosuke enters play, name a Squad. Zennosuke belongs to that Squad.
